name: CozyGarden
description:
Welcome to #CozyGarden! (Developed for the #CozyAutumnGameJam2022 game jam!)

It is a casual game that revolves around bringing back to life your Pa's rundown farm.

~UPDATE v1.1: Chickens~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

From humble beginnings. . . . 

To expansive carrot mono-cultures!

What will you build?

EDIT: v1.1 Feed the chickens!! :D

.

.

.

Follow me on Instagram for more interesting games like this!
